name: Real Badminton Super League
description:
Real Badminton Super League is most competitive badminton games ever! No advertisement will annoy you in this game.

Play more effectively with a perfect badminton star. Entertain yourself with ultimate badminton challenge games. Be a pro player with international badminton games to become a legend superstar in real badminton championship.

Enjoy the experience the real life badminton on mobile devices! In this game you have to compete with badminton players from all over the world. Play this game and become badminton master player.

Features of Badminton super league 3D:
- Easy Simple and smooth game play.
- Super bigger and greater badminton championship tournament.
- Compete against master badminton players & champions.
- Nice and mind blowing sound effect.
- Beautiful graphics with real Life Animations & realistic Physics
- Practice in friendly mode and challenge in tournament mode.
- Several attractive badminton outfits
- Do a crazy smash to defeat opponent

Let's enjoy most perfect badminton game.
